name: Huripka
description: Young wolf of loyalty, daughter of a guard.

name: Awsoodoo
description: Ambitious peacock of perfection, son of a master martial artist.

name: Frestian
description: Respected night shift guard, moved to peacock village with his daughter.

name: Soofawkoo
feathers: white and grey, with green rings
description: Master martial artist, trains young peacocks in the art of Pea-Fo.

name: Pantrinome
fur: orange fur, red hair, red tail tip
description: Noble cat who yearns for a better future.

name: Pantrinome
fur: orange fur, red hair, red tail tip
description: Noble cat who yearns for a better future.

name: Pantrinome's Mate
description: Adventurous cat who is a master planner.

name: Medic Lersha
description: Kind bear who takes care of others with her healing powers.

name: Matteti
description: Guard wolf who is always open to give advice.

name: Feistiven
description: Son of the wolf chief, has Hindsight, investigates serious crimes.
